statements: SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessment;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_date, data_processing_activity FROM privacy_impact_assessment;
SELECT data_subject_type, data_impact_level FROM privacy_impact_assessment WHERE data_subject_type = 'Employee';
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessment WHERE data_impact_level >= 3;
SELECT assessment_id, data_processing_activity FROM privacy_impact_assessment ORDER BY assessment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessment WHERE assessment_id = 1;
SELECT data_processing_activity, data_impact_level FROM privacy_impact_assessment WHERE data_subject_type = 'Customer' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(assessment_id) AS total_assessments, AVG(data_impact_level) AS avg_impact_level FROM privacy_impact_assessment WHERE data_impact_level > 3 GROUP BY data_subject_type;

SELECT assessment_id, data_processing_activity, assessment_date FROM privacy_impact_assessment WHERE data_subject_type = 'Employee' AND data_impact_level >= 2 ORDER BY data_impact_level ASC, assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessment WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PrivacyImpactAssessment;
SELECT activity, impact_score FROM PrivacyImpactAssessment;
SELECT id, activity, impact_score FROM PrivacyImpactAssessment WHERE impact_score > 5;
SELECT * FROM DataProcessingActivities ORDER BY data_category ASC;
SELECT activity_name, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM DataProcessingActivities GROUP BY activity_name;
SELECT * FROM PrivacyImpactAssessment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT activity, impact_score FROM PrivacyImpactAssessment WHERE impact_score > 50 ORDER BY activity DESC;
SELECT id, activity, impact_score FROM PrivacyImpactAssessment WHERE impact_score <= 30 AND activity LIKE '%security%';
SELECT MAX(impact_score) AS max_score FROM PrivacyImpactAssessment;
SELECT activity_name, data_category FROM DataProcessingActivities WHERE data_category = 'Personal Information' ORDER BY activity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessments;
SELECT id, assessment_name, assessment_date FROM privacy_impact_assessments;
SELECT * FROM data_processing_activities WHERE data_processed = 'Sensitive';
SELECT * FROM individual_privacy ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT assessment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_assessments FROM privacy_impact_assessments GROUP BY assessment_name;
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessments;
SELECT id, assessment_name, assessment_date FROM privacy_impact_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT impact_level FROM privacy_impact_assessments WHERE impact_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM data_processing_activities WHERE data_processed LIKE '%personal%';
SELECT individual_id, full_name FROM individual_privacy ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM assessment_result;
SELECT result_date, assessment_score FROM assessment_result WHERE assessment_score >= 80;
SELECT subject_name, subject_email, subject_phone FROM data_subject;
SELECT id, processor_name, contact_person FROM data_processor WHERE processor_location = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessment ORDER BY activity_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessment;
SELECT id, activity_name, data_impact_level FROM privacy_impact_assessment WHERE data_category = 'Financial';
SELECT subject_name, subject_email FROM data_subject WHERE subject_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM data_processor ORDER BY processor_name ASC;

SELECT assessment_result.id, assessment_result.result_date, assessment_score, activity_name FROM assessment_result INNER JOIN privacy_impact_assessment ON assessment_result.assessment_id = privacy_impact_assessment.id WHERE assessment_score >= 80 ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessments;
SELECT id, assessment_name, assessment_date FROM privacy_impact_assessments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description, assessment_name FROM privacy_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_processing_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Storage';
SELECT id, activity_name, data_category FROM data_processing_activities WHERE id < 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM privacy_impact_assessments;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM privacy_impact_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_processing_activities WHERE activity_type='Analysis';
SELECT assessment_name, description FROM privacy_impact_assessments WHERE id=1;

SELECT dp.activity_name, dr.assessment_result FROM data_processing_activities dp JOIN individual_privacy_records pr ON dp.id=pr.assessed_activity_id JOIN individual_privacy_records dr ON pr.individual_id=dr.individual_id;
